snippet: After losing three straight games on the road, the Rangers can take comfort knowing they will be in New York for 12 straight days.
abstract: New York Rangers will play a seven-game homestand, their longest of the season, which is a welcome break after losing three straight games on the road.
lead_paragraph: After losing three straight games on the road, the Rangers can take comfort knowing they will be in New York for 12 straight days.

headline.seo: For Rangers, a Chance to Sort Things Out at Home
headline.main: For Rangers, a Chance to Sort Things Out
headline.print_headline: For Rangers, a Chance to Sort Things Out
